greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest odd prime base q such that p^7 divides q^(p-1) - 1, where p = Prime[n].
link: W. Keller and J. Richstein Fermat quotients that are divisible by p.
program: (PARI) { a(n) = local(p,x,y); if(n==1,return(257)); p=prime(n); x=znprimroot(p^7)^(p^6); vecsort( vector(p-1,i, y=lift(x^i);while(!isprime(y),y+=p^7);y ) )[1] } - _Max Alekseyev_, May 30 2007
results.author: _Alexander Adamchuk_, Nov 29 2006
